title: Technical Projects
Bhabilsh Limbu
text:
I bridge the gap between complex statistical modeling and strategic business decisions. With a strong foundation in Computer Science (University of Greenwich) and specialized experience in Geospatial Optimization and Unsupervised Learning, I build tools that solve real-world problems.






Using Python, pvlib, and Uber H3 to model and optimize solar panel placement in complex urban environments.



Applied PCA and K-Means to segment credit card users, identifying key behavioral clusters for targeted marketing.



Power BI dashboards and data migration strategy that linked tutor engagement to student retention.
